events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because the product I got is not what I paid for.
The customer's request has been classified under the Refund category due to the mention of refund and wrong item.
Support agent Jenny has been assigned to handle the refund case for the customer inquiry regarding an incorrect order.
Hello! I’m Jenny from customer support. I’m sorry to hear about the wrong item. Let me help you process your refund quickly.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so I can verify and initiate the refund process?
Thank you for the quick response. My order number is 987654321, and I have attached a photo showing the incorrect item that was delivered.
I have reviewed your information and confirmed the mistake. I am now processing your full refund, which should appear in your account within 5-7 business days.
Thanks for the update and quick handling of my refund request. I appreciate the smooth process and your prompt assistance.
The refund request has been successfully processed, and the case is now resolved. Please reach out if you need any further assistance.
We’re following up to confirm that your refund has been received. Please let us know if everything is satisfactory or if you have additional questions.
Since we haven’t heard back from you, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support, and have a great day!
